page.title: 12 OUR LOCAL SHOP - CALNE
page.content: In Brown's shop they sell books and sweets, pens and pencils, they sell football stickers and comics and toys. They sell batteries and ornaments, and they sell towels.They sell some food like eggs, biscuits,bacon, breakfast things, potatoes and cakes.I go in Brown's shop every day after school and I buy sweets and my mum buys apples and cakes and some crisps. My mum uses Brown's shop when she has forgotten something. My mum gets her shopping from the supermarket, Gateways in town. We usually buy our clothes from the market which comes to Calne every Friday, or from Swindon. We go to Swindon on the bus.
